name: CVE-2020-0688 Exploitation via Eventlog
description: Detects the exploitation of Microsoft Exchange vulnerability as described in CVE-2020-0688
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Application AND (event.code:4 AND winlog.provider_name:MSExchange\ Control\ Panel AND winlog.event_data.Level:Error) AND &__VIEWSTATE\=)`
